mapper.sql: order_id, order_no, order_datetime, order_payableamount, order_realpayamount, order_amount, order_discountamount, order_discountinfo, order_paytype, order_payid, order_deliverytime, order_deliveryamount, order_invoiceid, order_userid, order_addressid, order_addressprovince, order_addresscity, order_addresscounty, order_addressstreet, order_addressconsignee, order_addressmobile, order_deleted
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.*, c.*, d.*, e.* FROM str_order a LEFT JOIN sys_status b ON a.order_statusid = b.status_id LEFT JOIN str_order_detail c ON a.order_id = c.detail_orderid LEFT JOIN str_invoice d ON a.order_invoiceid = d.invoice_id LEFT JOIN str_store e ON a.order_storeid = e.store_id WHERE order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT a.*, b.*, c.*, d.*, e.* FROM str_order a LEFT JOIN sys_status b ON a.order_statusid = b.status_id LEFT JOIN str_order_detail c ON a.order_id = c.detail_orderid LEFT JOIN str_invoice d ON a.order_invoiceid = d.invoice_id LEFT JOIN str_store e ON a.order_storeid = e.store_id WHERE order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select (count(1) + 1) as serial from str_order where date_format(order_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert: insert into str_order (order_id, order_no, order_datetime,order_statusid, order_payableamount, order_realpayamount, order_amount, order_discountamount, order_discountinfo, order_paytype, order_payid, order_deliverytime, order_deliveryamount, order_invoiceid, order_userid, order_addressid, order_addressprovince, order_addresscity, order_addresscounty, order_addressstreet, order_addressconsignee, order_addressmobile, order_deleted,order_storeid) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{orderStatusid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderPayableamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderRealpayamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderDiscountamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderDiscountinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderPaytype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderPayid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderDeliverytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDeliveryamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderInvoiceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderAddressid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderAddressprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddresscity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddresscounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddressstreet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddressconsignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddressmobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{orderStoreId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update str_order
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_datetime = #{orderDatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_statusid = #{orderStatusid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_payableamount = #{orderPayableamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
order_realpayamount = #{orderRealpayamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
order_amount = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
order_discountamount = #{orderDiscountamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
order_discountinfo = #{orderDiscountinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_paytype = #{orderPaytype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_payid = #{orderPayid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_deliverytime = #{orderDeliverytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_deliveryamount = #{orderDeliveryamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
order_invoiceid = #{orderInvoiceid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_userid = #{orderUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_addressid = #{orderAddressid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_addressprovince = #{orderAddressprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_addresscity = #{orderAddresscity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_addresscounty = #{orderAddresscounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

order_addressmobile = #{orderAddressmobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_deleted = #{orderDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_storeid = #{orderStoreId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update str_order set order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_statusid = #{orderStatusid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_datetime = #{orderDatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_payableamount = #{orderPayableamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, order_realpayamount = #{orderRealpayamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, order_amount = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, order_discountamount = #{orderDiscountamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, order_discountinfo = #{orderDiscountinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_paytype = #{orderPaytype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_payid = #{orderPayid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_deliverytime = #{orderDeliverytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_deliveryamount = #{orderDeliveryamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, order_invoiceid = #{orderInvoiceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_userid = #{orderUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_addressid = #{orderAddressid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_addressprovince = #{orderAddressprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_addresscity = #{orderAddresscity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_addresscounty = #{orderAddresscounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_addressstreet = #{orderAddressstreet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_addressconsignee = #{orderAddressconsignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_addressmobile = #{orderAddressmobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_deleted = #{orderDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_storeid = #{orderStoreId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
